name: Lion House Cheesecake
ingredients: 1 1/2 c Graham cracker crumbs, rolled fine 6 Tbsp butter or margarine
3 8 ounce packages softened cream cheese 3 eggs
steps: Thoroughly mix ingredients. Press firmly in a 9 or 10 in pie pan or springform pan lining bottom and sides,
Beat cream cheese well. Add sugar a little at a time . Add vanilla. Combine thoroughly. Pour into crust . Fill to
within 1/2 in of to to allow for topping. Bake 60 minutes at 300 degrees.
Whip sour cream; add sugar gradually; add vanilla. Pour over pie and return to oven.
Bake for 10 minutes at 300 degrees. Cool.
